tha-ap44:8.4: kusalabbhave → kusale bhave (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap44:15.2: pavarā ca sā → pavarāvayā (sya1ed, sya2ed); pavarā mayā (pts-vp-pli1); pavarā piyā (?)
tha-ap44:19.2: parikkhatā → purakkhatā (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
tha-ap44:30.1: āyasmā soṇo koḷiviso → soṇo koṭikaṇṇo (bj, mr); soṇo koṭiyavesso (sya1ed, sya2ed); soṇo koḷiyavesso (pts-vp-pli1)
